'''"Flag of Huitztlan"''' is a creatable [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Flag of Huitztlan" is obtainable from a Remarkable Chest in [[Natlan]].

==How to Obtain==
Obtained from a Remarkable Chest in {{Location|Sulfurous Veins}} after defeating enemies: {{Enemy List|Forged Sand Interrogator; Forged Sand Shieldbreaker}}
<gallery>
Item "Flag of Huitztlan" Location.png|Map location
Item "Flag of Huitztlan" Context.png|Additional context
</gallery>

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Fabric = 4
|Yellow Dye = 2
|Blue Dye = 2
|sort = Fabric;Yellow Dye;Blue Dye
}}
